movies.title: Big Bad Bugs
movies.plot: After a convoy of American soldiers disappears, a special ops team is deployed to rescue them. They soon encounter an army of gigantic scorpions, spiders and snakes that have come to Earth from another dimension.
movies.simplePlot: After a convoy of American soldiers disappears, a special ops team is deployed to rescue them. They soon encounter an army of gigantic scorpions, spiders and snakes that have come to Earth from another dimension.

biography.bio: Jack Plotnick was born on October 30, 1968 in Columbus, Ohio, USA as Jack Stuart Plotnick. He is an actor and producer, known for Rubber (2010), Meet the Fockers (2004) and Down with Love (2003).
biography.name: Jack Plotnick

biography.bio: Sarah Lieving began her acting career in 2002 with a minor role in the film Coastlines (2002). 2005 proved to be a busy year for the lovely brunette as she found roles in the video film adaptation of War of the Worlds (2005). After that she followed with work in creature, fantasy and science fiction-based outings including Frankenstein Reborn (2005), The Beast of Bray Road (2005), and King of the Lost World (2005) all in that same year. Other titles followed in 2006, with varied themes of horror, the supernatural, and thrilling dramas starting with Dracula's Curse (2006), 666: The Child (2006), The 9/11 Commission Report (2006) and The Utah Murder Project (2006). In 2007, Sarah found continued work in films of the same theme. In 2008, she appeared in the high-profile movie Lakeview Terrace (2008) starring Samuel L. Jackson. She made a stronger showing in the creature flick Mega Shark vs. Crocosaurus (2010) as a tough US agent. In addition to her video and film work, Sarah has found roles on television series such as Criminal Minds (2005) and The Witches of Oz (2011).
biography.name: Sarah Lieving

biography.bio: Ted Jonas is an actor and writer, known for All the Way (2016), Blaster (2017) and Big Bad Bugs (2012).
biography.name: Ted Jonas

biography.bio: Camden Toy is best known for playing some of the creepiest and scariest villains on Buffy the Vampire Slayer. He played one of the Gentlemen in the Emmy Award nominated episode "Hush", the skin eating demon Gnarl, and the recurring role of the all powerful Ubervamp. He also appeared on the fifth season of Angel as The Prince of Lies. Toy was a series regular on both the Emmy Award winning series The Bay, and the television sitcom Goodnight Burbank.
biography.name: Camden Toy

biography.bio: Bo Kane grew up in Griffith, Indiana, the youngest of three boys. He graduated from the University of Notre Dame (where he was also on the boxing team) with a degree in Business Administration, and later received his MBA from the University of Denver. The switch from business to acting began in Chicago when Bo was studying at Second City, and was hired as a precision driver for the film "The Blues Brothers". He began his LA acting career in the 80's with shows like Young & Restless, General Hospital, films such as El Norte and Child's Play, and several commercials. During that time he began a volunteer job as an equestrian coach for the California Special Olympics, a position that he held for 16 years, and included coaching athletes in the World Games. Bo is a former newspaper columnist, and is the author of the book "50 Acting Scenes For Teens" (Burbank Publishing). He and his wife, Denise Loveday, have two children. Bo is the kids' baseball, assistant basketball, and acting coach, and uses far too many sports metaphors in his acting classes for kids. Bo is also an avid video cameraman, working not only on independent projects, but casting athletes for film and commercial projects.
biography.name: Bo Kane

biography.bio: Devon Ogden was born on January 10, 1986 in Fairfax, Virginia, USA. She is an actress, known for The Founder (2016), Heritage Falls (2016) and StartUp (2016).
biography.name: Devon Ogden

biography.bio: Randy Clark was born in Harlem, New York, USA. He is known for his work on After the Fall: A New York Story (2007), Big Bad Bugs (2012) and Holla II (2013).
biography.name: Randy Clark

biography.bio: Kris Wheeler is an actor and producer, known for Open House (2010), Cougars Inc. (2011) and Frat Party (2009).
biography.name: Kris Wheeler

biography.bio: Steve Silverie is known for his work on Big Bad Bugs (2012), Rapid Assault (1997) and Bella Mafia (1997).
biography.name: Steve Silverie

biography.bio: Tyler McGee was born on March 15, 1982 in California, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for A True Story (2013), Foreign Exchange (2008) and Big Bad Bugs (2012).
biography.name: Tyler McGee

biography.bio: Andre Tenerelli is known for his work on Assassins (2014), Nazis at the Center of the Earth (2012) and Continuity (2009).
biography.name: Andre Tenerelli

biography.bio: Michael Monks is an actor and director, known for End of Watch (2012), Harsh Times (2005) and Air Force One (1997).
biography.name: Michael Monks

biography.bio: Don Williams is an actor, known for Grey's Anatomy (2005), Criminal Minds (2005) and Aquarius (2015).
biography.name: Don Williams

biography.bio: Kenny Lombino is an actor, known for Alchemy (2013), Delivered (2011) and To Desdemona, Love Juliet (2011).
biography.name: Kenny Lombino

biography.bio: Carmen Thomas is known for her work on Yellow (2012), Pop Star Puppy (2014) and Big Bad Bugs (2012).
biography.name: Carmen Thomas
